ABOUT READER'S DIGEST ASSOCIATION (CANADA) ULC 

The ReaderÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Digest Association is a leading global, multi-brand and multi-platform media and direct marketing company that educates, entertains and connects audiences around the world. We are dedicated to providing our customers with the inspiration, ideas and tools to simplify and enrich their lives.

The Reader's Digest Magazines Ltd. Canadian operations began its activities in 1947, more than sixty-five years ago, with the publication of SÃƒÂ©lection, its French-language magazine. With time, the company has become a leading Canadian multi-brand media and marketing powerhouse that aims to educate, entertain and connect audiences across the country. It now publishes five magazines, including Reader's Digest and SÃƒÂ©lection, Canada's most widely read magazines with more than 6 million readers per month. ReaderÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Digest brands include the reader contributed magazine Our Canada and its companion More of Our Canada as well as a healthy lifestyle magazine for Canadian women, Best Health. Reader's Digest operates six branded websites (readersdigest.ca, selection.ca, ourcanada.ca, besthealthmag.ca, plaisirsante.ca and tasteofhomecanada.com). In June 2013, ReaderÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Digest will welcome Taste of Home Canada to our family of magazines in English and French.

Reader's Digest has always prided itself in the Canadian market as being the most influential Canadian magazine reaching nearly 1 in 5 Canadians, more than any other magazine in Canada.

The success of one of Canada's most recognizable and trusted brand names has been due in part to the highest integrity with which the company treats its customers and its quality products. ReaderÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Digest is a multi-platform content provider delivering the highest quality information to its customers, where, when and how they want it, via print, online, e-newsletters, digital media and most recently, the iPad edition.
